subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Aroldis Chapman, in his first major league appearance since a spring training injury, fired a 100-mile-per-hour fastball and struck out the side in the ninth in a victory for Cincinnati.
snippet: Aroldis Chapman, in his first major league appearance since a spring training injury, fired a 100-mile-per-hour fastball and struck out the side in the ninth in a victory for Cincinnati.
